name: ProBoon
description:
This project is meant to bring back the old-school shooting action from the 90s. Made with UE4 and using sprites and low res textures, it offers a complete single player campaign and multiplayer with different modes, including co-op and deathmatch. And full access to the code for your own use.

PLAY the game. Great alone, better together.

Enjoy the same features from the good old days: Fast paced gameplay; Tons of enemies & secrets; No reloads; Kill by skill; Co-op with friends or random people; Adrenaline fueled deathmatch.

MAKE your game. Take the code and create your own.

We go beyond modding, you'll have all the game logic and assets available so you can create and publish your own games, commercially or not, including single player & multiplayer with different modes!
